name: places/ChIJgT-tAg9ZwokRVYz2_fQjSmg
adrFormatAddress: 530 1st Ave. #5B, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: Had to stop going to phototherapy after my terrible experience with Dr. Soter. He expressed 0 interest in working with me and only asks you 1 question: "what's your itch level now on a scale of 1-5" I've seen many many dermatologists in my time and I've never come across a worse doctor. The sad part is, the institution and nursing staff is aware and no one is doing anything about his negligent care. He should be sued or retire, anything less is disservice to those seeking treatment at the NYU Phototherapy clinic. I would give him "0" stars if I could. DO NOT SEE THIS DOCTOR.

The sad part is, the institution and nursing staff is aware and no one is doing anything about his negligent care. He should be sued or retire, anything less is disservice to those seeking treatment at the NYU Phototherapy clinic. I would give him "0" stars if I could. DO NOT SEE THIS DOCTOR.

originalText.text: After having debilitating hives for four years, Dr. Soter was able to manage my situation and get me back to work, to sleep and to generally function. I recommended him to my friend with great success and now to my son who has suffered with hives. I am optimistic that if anyone can help, Dr. Soter can.
